"About \"HP Recovery\"":
"Damage
When your HP becomes zero,
you are incapacitated and cannot fight.

As your HP goes down,
using items such as a 「Monomate」,
can restore your HP."

"Use the recovery medicine Monomate that is registered on your Subpalette.

Items on your <%Subpalette>
can be selected and used.

※Using <%SubpaletteLeft> and <%SubpaletteRight>, you can move
the selection of your Subpalette."
